item.title: Report E-2023100624
item.description:
Report E-2023100624

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On October 10, 2023, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN3149 was crushed during transit due to improper blocking and bracing techniques and released approximately four (4) gallons of product to the trailer floor and gravel below. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the impacted site. Union Pacific (UP) personnel would not allow any third-party contractors on-site without prior approval. At approximately 8:15 PM CDT, a crew from GES arrived on-site and were instructed to remain on standby until further notice. It was later determined that GES personnel would not be authorized to make entry onto UP property and any remediation would be handled by another party retained by UP. CES and GES were advised to stand down by Mr. Judah.

item.title: Report X-2023100174
item.description:
Report X-2023100174

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LOOSE CAP MISSING DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: CAP BECAME LOOSE AND WAS SEPERATED FROM THE JUG. ALL CORROSIVE LIQUID LEAKED OUT AND SOILED THE WET CRUSHED TORN OPENED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023100104
item.description:
Report X-2023100104

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package brought to qa leaking gold liquid, no hazman/lq markings on box, opened and examined contents, package appeared to be paint of some sort, checked on company's website for SDS, package is regulated for transport by DOT DescribePack: lids on 2 drums came loose, each leaked approx half of their contents DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package put in lined tote box
